original_text: When you see new leaves on a tree, you know that summer will come soon. Nobody needs to tell you that.
korean_text: 싹이 나면 너희가 보고 여름이 가까운 줄을 자연히 아나니

sentences.original_text: When you see new leaves on a tree
you know that summer will come soon
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 여름이 곧 올 것이라는 것을 압니다

sentences.original_text: Nobody needs to tell you that
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그것을 당신에게 말해줄 필요가 없습니다
